Name: Potted Parrot
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
Prepare garnish of parrot on stick & mint sprig.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron's 1947-72 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide , this cocktail remains popular in Trader Vic's restaurants.
Nutrition: One serving of Potted Parrot contains 240 calories
